app.name: GCPadder
app.long_description:
GCPadder is a utility that allows you to send your GameCube controller's inputs to your computer, either wirelessly or using a USB Gecko. (Performance is best on a stable ethernet connection or a USB Gecko.) Read more information and download the corresponding PC application from https://github.com/InvoxiPlayGames/GCPadder
THIS IS INCOMPATIBLE WITH WIIS WITHOUT GAMECUBE PORTS. (Obviously!)
